name: BandZai Token
description: BandZai game is a Play and earn NFT card game on polygon ZKEVM. ZAIs are clumsy but fierce mythical creatures whose principal hobby is, well, fighting each other! Buy your very own ZAIs and send them to battle in quest for fame and experience, or level them up through a unique training system. Earn $BZAI as you win fights with your ZAIs, or take control over one of our unique centers and start nursing and selling Zais, training them or crafting potions! Get more powerful and more exclusive ZAIs, fight your way to the end game in both PVE and PvP modes and earn ever greater rewards!
